PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07722010-06-17HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectStatistics Canada Census-Related Term Employment Regulations
PrecisSTATISTICS CANADA CENSUS-RELATED TERM EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS prescribe how excluded employees and positions are to be dealt with. There are alternate definitions and provisions for “acting appointments” and “deployments”; both of these are limited to positions excluded by the Order. Appointments and deployments to excluded positions are made on a specified term basis only. The Regulations provide a shorter notice period for the termination of employment as a result of rejection on probation than provided in the PSEA.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0147 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
